title: Error when compiling cairo-lang-semantic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Cant seem to compile the latest version of the cairo-lang-semantic crate ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.2 (9eb3afe9e 2023-03-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0 commit-date: 2023-03-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.2 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: could not compile 'cairo-lang-semantic' ```
Backtrace

``` query stack during panic: #0 [lookup_stability] looking up stability of `items::imp::::T` #1 [check_mod_unstable_api_usage] checking for unstable API usage in module `items::imp` #2 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1098914 but the index is 1099944', /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:1348:15 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f2b0d86659a -
